name: Factory Women
author: Julio Lopez Montalvo

sections.description: A WordPress’s plugin to setting up posts as test data. You can create posts or pages, indicating number of items, their titles and content.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload all files ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Finally go to the Settings -> Factory to create your posts and pages
sections.faq:
What about custom post types?

We’re working on it.
